Test Steps: Navigate to the product listing page
Select a category from the filter menu
Expected Result: Only products from the selected category are shown
Actual Result: Products from the selected category shown

Test Steps: Enter a min and max price and apply filter
Expected Result: Products within the price range are displayed

Test Case Description: Check sorting by price (High to Low)
Test Steps: Sort products by selecting 'High to Low' option
Expected Result: Products are sorted from highest to lowest price

Test Case Description: Ensure responsive design on mobile devices
Test Steps: Resize browser window to mobile dimensions
Expected Result: Layout adapts to fit smaller screens correctly
Remarks: Responsive design confirmed on multiple devices
